title: Can i refund my xp boost?
body: Yesterday I was a day off so I bought a 1day xp boost. But your server is down. I don't play game. because i working today. Please refund 1day xp boost.

replies.body: How do I can submit a ticket

We did have some service incidents in the last day or two, so we may be able to help you out if you [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us) with our accounts team. I can't guarantee anything, but that's the best place to reach out about your boost.

Let me know if you have any questions.
